speaker: Patient
text: I think I might've taken an extra dose of the furosemide yesterday. I was feeling a bit dizzy afterward.

speaker: Clinician
text: Okay, let's see. That could definitely cause some dizziness, especially with your kidney function. How are you feeling today?

speaker: Patient
text: A bit better, but still not quite right. My daughter said I should call you if it happened again.

speaker: Clinician
text: That's good advice. We might need to adjust your dose or timing. Have you noticed any changes in your weight or swelling?

speaker: Patient
text: No, not really. My weight's been about the same, and I haven't seen much swelling.

speaker: Clinician
text: Alright, that's helpful to know. Let's keep an eye on it, and maybe we can set up a more consistent schedule with your daughter to help manage the doses.
